review.title: Participation anticipating in elections using data mining methods
review.abstract: Anticipating the political behavior of people will be considerable help for election candidates to assess the possibility of their success and to be acknowledged about the public motivations to select them. In this paper, we provide a general schematic of the architecture of participation anticipating system in presidential election by using KNN, Classification Tree and Na\"ive Bayes and tools orange based on crisp which had hopeful output. To test and assess the proposed model, we begin to use the case study by selecting 100 qualified persons who attend in 11th presidential election of Islamic republic of Iran and anticipate their participation in Kohkiloye & Boyerahmad. We indicate that KNN can perform anticipation and classification processes with high accuracy in compared with two other algorithms to anticipate participation.

sections.text: DOI: 10.5121 / ijci.2013.2205 47Anticipating the political behavior of people will greatly help candidates in assessing the possibility of their success and recognizing their public motivation in the selection process. In this paper, we present a general scheme of the architecture of participation to anticipate the system in the presidential elections, using KNN, Classification Tree and Naïve Bayes and tools orange based on crisp, hopeful results. In order to test and evaluate the proposed model, we begin the case study of selecting 100 qualified individuals who will participate in the 11th presidential elections of the Islamic Republic of Iran and anticipate their participation in Kohkiloye & Boyerahmad. We point out that KNN can carry out anticipation and classification processes with high accuracy compared to two other algorithms in order to anticipate participation.KEYWORDSAnticipating, Data Mining, Naïve Bayes, Nree Classification, KTN
